page.title: 16A Usual School Day,Congleton
page.content: I wake up at 7.00 and go downstairs to have breakfast which is usually cereal. I go and wash and put on my school uniform, then I go to catch the bus. When I get to school my friend and I join assembly where all the classes say prayers and sing hymns together. After I do Maths. At 10.30 it is playtime when we have a break from work. Then I do S.R.A. where we read a story and answer several questions. After S.R.A. we have lunch, children may bring their own lunch or they may have a school dinner.After lunch it is play time which ends at 1.00.I then do an individual project till the last playtime which is at 2.00. after that we sometimes does P.E. I then go home on the bus, get changed and have my tea. At 7.30pm I watch T.V. and go to bed at 9.00pm.
